outcome.title: Top Level operations 1
outcome.description: I can recognize top level operations in an algebraic expression: sum, difference, product, quotient, or composition.

outcome.title: Exponent Rules 1
outcome.description: I can manipulate expressions with exponents and common bases.

outcome.title: Exponent Rules 2
outcome.description: I can do arithmetic with rational exponents.

outcome.title: Factoring 1
outcome.description: I can factor quadratic expressions over the rational numbers. **Factor** means: *turn a sum/difference into a product*.

outcome.title: Factoring 2
outcome.description: I can factor out common terms from a sum to obtain a product of irreducible factors. **Factor** means: *turn a sum/difference into a product*.

outcome.title: Expanding 1
outcome.description: I can use FOIL or Pascal's Triangle to expand binomials raised to whole number powers. **Expand** means: *turn a product into a sum/difference*.

outcome.title: Expanding 2
outcome.description: I can expand products with factors beyond binomials; e.g., products in which at least one of the factors is a sum of three or more terms. **Expand** means: *turn a product into a sum/difference*.

outcome.title: Cancellation rules 1
Analyzing Products/Quotients 1
outcome.description: I can determine when a product/quotient is zero and/or undefined.

outcome.title: Analyzing Products/Quotients 2
outcome.description: I can use a sign chart to determine when a product/quotient is positive and/or negative.

outcome.title: Basic Library of functions, equations, graphs/sketches 1
outcome.description: I can write an equation and sketch a graph for a line determined either by (1) one point and a slope, or (2) two points.

outcome.title: Basic Library of functions, equations, graphs/sketches 2
outcome.description: I can write an equation for a circle with a given center and radius. Conversely, I can identify the center and radius from an equation which defines a circle.

outcome.title: Synthesis of skills and techniques 1
outcome.description: I can manipulate expressions and solve equations by successively performing multiple algebraic steps.

outcome.title: Synthesis of skills and techniques 2
outcome.description: I can determine the domain of an algebraic function.
